title: Yelfir

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Envelop an ally in a holy veil, giving them Powerful defense on this night and Basic on the next one if they weren't attacked. (1 use)
- Purge a target of any negative effects, during the next day, you may assign any effects you purged to another player. (1 use)
- Use strong healing magic on a player, giving them Invincible defense, if they are attacking someone this night, this will instead deal an Unstoppable attack. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Gain 1 use of all abilities once you consume all uses of them.

desc:
Post 4094
*A powerful nu mou white mage*
